title: Drug diversity in bacteria
summary: Bacteria produce a cocktail of various bioactive natural products in order to survive in hostile environments with competing (micro)organisms. Researchers demonstrate that they do so by modifying basic structures, similar to the approach taken in pharmaceutical research.
